comments:
JiraConnectorUi fails to load for some reason. Cleaning the configuration area did not fix it (working bootstrapped). Oddly running another test workbench works fine.

It hit again. This is starting to look like a race condition during initialization.

Rob: this is due to reading the UI extension points before the UI is loaded, so that move we made was wrong.  So instead of this approach I will need to guard against null connectorUi's in the decorators.
Steffen: please report if you see an problems related to this.
